utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Ok, so this is pretty much what's happened so far. Ross was in love with Rachel since, you know, forever, but every time he tried to tell her, something kind of got in the way, like cats, and Italian guys. Finally Chandler was like "forget about her" but when Ross was in China on his dig, Chandler let it slip that Ross was in love with Rachel. She was like, "Oh my god." So she went to the airport to meet him when he came back, but what she didn't know was, that Ross was getting off the plane with another woman. Uh-Oh! So, that's pretty much everything you need to know. But, enough about us. So, how've you been?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Oh my god. Oh my god. Excuse me. Move! Move! Emergency! Excuse me!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Rache!

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Oh, there you are! Hi! Oh, so, so, how was China, you?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: It was, it was great. Oh, what happened?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: You're bleeding.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: I am? Oh, look at that, yes I am. Enough about me, enough about me, Mr. Back from the Orient. I wanna hear everything!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Well, where do I start? This is Julie. Julie, this is Rachel.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: These are, these aren't for you. These are for you. Welcome to our country.

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: Thank you. I'm from New York.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Ok, well, not a problem. We'll just use them to stop the bleeding. Ok. Baggage claim? Ok.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: No way!

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: I'm telling you, she went to the airport, and she's gonna go for it with Ross!

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Oh my god. This is huge. This is bigger than huge. This is like, all right, what's bigger than huge?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Um, this?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Guys, you got your hair cut.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Yes, yes, we did, thanks to Vidal Buffay.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: 'Cause, you know, if you don't look good, we don't look good. I love that voice.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Airport, airport. Ross, not alone, Julie, arm around her. Cramp, cramp.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Ok, I think she's trying to tell us something. Quick, get the verbs.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: You, you, you said he liked me. You, you slowpokes!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: That's all right, Rache, we got the bags. Hi, hello. Julie, this is my sister Monica. This is Chandler. Phoebe. Joey, what up?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: What up?!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Everyone, this is Julie.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Julie.

utterance.speaker: ALL
utterance.content: Ohh. Hi!

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: Hi, but I'm not here, you haven't met me. I'll make a much better first impression tomorrow when I don't have 20 hours of cab and plane on me.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: And bus.

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: Oh my god.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: The screaming guy?

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: And the spitting?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: You gotta hear this story.

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: We're on this bus, that's easily 200 years old...

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: At least.

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: ...and this guy--

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: And the chicken poops in her lap. Oh, I'm so sorry. I just gave away the ending, didn't I? Oh! It's just, I just heard this story in the cab, and it is all I can think about.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: This is amazing. I mean, how, how did this happen?

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: Well, Ross and I were in grad school together.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: But we haven't seen each other since then. Well I land in China, guess who's in charge of the dig.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Julie! Julie, isn't that great? I mean, isn't that just kick- you-in-the-crotch, spit-on-your-neck fantastic?

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: It's an expression.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Well, we just wanted to say a quick hi, and then we're gonna go see the baby.

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: And then we've gotta get some sleep.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Yeah, it's really 6:00 tomorrow night our time.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Well, listen, don't tell us what's gonna happen though, 'cause I like to be surprised.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Hey, Rache, can I get some coffee?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Yeah, sure.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Hey, Rache, can I get--

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Did you talk to him?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Not yet.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Then, no.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: So what the hell happened to you in China? I mean, when last we left you, you were totally in love with, you know.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: I know, I know I was, but there was always this little voice inside that kept saying it's never gonna happen, move on. You know whose voice that was?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: God?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: It was you, pal.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Well, maybe it was God, doing me.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Look, you were right. She looks at me and sees a friend, that's all. But then I met Julie, and I don't know, we're havin' a great time. And I have to say, I never would've gone for it with her if it hadn't been for you.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Well, you owe me one, big guy.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Here's your lemonade.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: I didn't order lemonade.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Oh. Well then, you better go take that back because they're gonna charge you for that.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: But--

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Go go go go, come on! So then, well, what did you find out?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: He said, he said that they're having a great time. I'm sorry. But, the silver lining, if you wanna see it, is that he made the decision all by himself without any outside help whatsoever.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: How is that the silver lining?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: You have to really wanna see it.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Ironically, these are the guys who were picked last in gym.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Phoebes, you know what I'm thinking?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Oh, ok. How, it's been so long since you've had sex, you're wondering if they've changed it?

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: No, although now that's what I'm thinking.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: All right, so what were you thinking?

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Well, I was thinking, that you gave the guys such great haircuts, I thought, maybe you'd like to do mine?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Ohh! No.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Because, I'm just, I'm incredibly anal and an unbelievable control freak.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: No you're not.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: I know I'm not, but you are, and I was trying to spare your feelings.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Hello? Oh, hi. Yeah, hold on a second. Ross, it's Julie, for you.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Hello? Hi.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Hi. Anybody know a good tailor?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Needs some clothes altered?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: No, no, I'm just looking for a man to draw on me with chalk.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Why don't you go see Frankie? My family's been goin' to him forever. He did my first suit when I was 15. No wait, 16. No, 'scuse me, 15. All right, when was 1990?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: You have to stop the Q-tip when there's resistance!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Ok, ok, sweetheart, I'll see you later. Ok, bye. What? Oh, that is so sweet. No, no, ok, you hang up. Ok, ok, one, two, three. Well you didn't hang up either.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: She didn't hang up either!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Ok, no, no, you hang up. You, you, y--

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Sorry, I thought you were talking to me.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Rachel! I'll just call her back.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Hi? Sorry, we got disconnected...

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Ok, ok, ok. How did this happen to me? How did this happen to me? A week ago, two weeks ago, I was fine. Ross was just Ross, just this guy. Now he's Rrrooossss, oh, this really great guy that I can't have.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Sweetie, I wanted you to have him too.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: I know you did. I'm just gonna deal with it, I'm just gonna deal with it. I gotta get out of here.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Ok, I don't care what you guys say, something's bothering her.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: You know, I think I was sixteen.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Please, just a little bit off the back.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: I'm still on "no".

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Uh, morning. Do you guys think you could close your eyes for just a sec?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: No no no no no, I'm not fallin' for that again.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: What's goin' on?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Well, I sorta did a stupid thing last night.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: What stupid thing did you do?

utterance.speaker: PAOLO
utterance.content: Bon giorno tutti!

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Ewww!

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Ok, Paulo, why don't you just go get dressed, and then you be on your way, ok, bye-bye.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Rachel, how did this happen?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: I don't know, I just kinda ran into him last night.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Where?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: At his apartment. Is this juice?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Whoa, whoa. And the fact that you dumped him because he hit on Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Oh God, I know I'm a pathetic loser.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Honey, you're not pathetic, you're sad.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: People do stupid things when they're upset.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: My god, if I had a nickel for every guy I wish I hadn't--but this is about your horrible mistake.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Hi. Sorry we're late but we were--well, there was touching.

utterance.speaker: PAOLO
utterance.content: Hey, hey Ross.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Hey, Paulo. What are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: PAOLO
utterance.content: I do Raquel.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: So, uh, he's back.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Yeah, he's back. Is that a problem?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: No, not a problem.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Good! I'm glad it's not a problem.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Ok, you're gonna have to not touch my ass.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Well, in spite of the yummy bagels and palpable tension, I've got pants that need to be altered.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Hey, Chandler, when you see Frankie, tell him Joey Tribbiani says hello. He'll know what it means.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Are you sure he's gonna be able to crack that code?

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: You know it's funny, the last time Paulo was here, my hair was so much shorter and cuter.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: All right. Ok, but, but you have to promise that you will not be all like control-y and bossy and Monica about it.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: I promise.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: All right. Now some of you are gonna get cut, and some of you aren't. But I promise none of you are gonna feel a thing.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: All right, that's it, I quit.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: What? I didn't say anything.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Yeah, but this isn't the face of a person who trusts a person. Ok, this is the face of a person who, you know, doesn't trust a person.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, Phoebe. It's just a little shorter than what we had discussed.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Would you relax? I know what I am doing. This is how he wears it.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: How who wears it?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Demi Moore.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Demi Moore is not a he.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Well, he was a he in Arthur, and in Ten.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: That's Dudley Moore. I said I wanted it like Demi Moore.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Oh, oh, oh my god!

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Oh my god!

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I'm sorry. Which one's Demi Moore?

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: She's the actress who was in Disclosure, Indecent Proposal, Ghost.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Oh, she's got gorgeous hair.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: I KNOW!

utterance.speaker: FRANKIE
utterance.content: How long do you want the cuffs?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: At least as long as I have the pants.

utterance.speaker: FRANKIE
utterance.content: I just got that. Ok, now we'll do your inseam.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: How is she?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: It's too soon to tell. She's resting, which is a good sign.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: How's the hair?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: I'm not gonna lie to you, Ross, it doesn't look good. I put a clip on one side, which seems to have stopped the curling.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Can we see her?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Your hair looks too good, I think it would upset her. Ross, you come on in.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: How're you doing?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: I'm ok.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Ooh, that bad, huh? Look, I can sense when women are depressed and vulnerable. It's one of my gifts.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: When I saw him get off that plane with her, I really thought I hit rock bottom. But today, it's like there's rock bottom, then 50 feet of crap, then me.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: You gotta tell Ross how you feel.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Come on. How can I just tell him? What about Julie?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: What about her? They've only been going out for two weeks. Ross has been in love with you for like 10 years.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: I don't know, I don't know.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Look, Rache, Rache, I've been with my share of women. In fact, I've been with like a lot of people's share of women. The point is, I've never felt about anyone the way Ross felt about you.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Yo, paisan! Can I talk to you for a sec? Your tailor is a very bad man!

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Frankie? What're you talking about?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Hey, what's goin' on?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Joey's tailor...took advantage of me.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: No way. I've been going to the guy for 12 years.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: He said he was going to do my inseam, and he ran his hand up my leg, and then, there was definite--

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: what?

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Cupping.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: That's how they do pants! First they go up one side, they move it over, they go up the other side, they move it back, and then they do the rear. What? Ross, Ross, would you tell him? Isn't that how they measure pants?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Yes, yes it is. In prison! Whatsa matter with you?

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: What? That's not? Oh my god.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Even Mary Tyler Moore would've been better.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: I like it. I do, I think it's a Ten.

utterance.speaker: MONICA
utterance.content: Thank you. My hair is very amused.

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: Come on, Monica, things could be worse. You could get caught between the moon and New York City. I know it's crazy, but it's true.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Well, I gotta go. Bye. Bye, Rache.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Wait, are you leaving?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Yeah, that's kinda what I meant by "bye!"

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Well, can I talk to you for a sec?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: Hey, when the doctor does that hernia test...

utterance.speaker: CHANDLER
utterance.content: That's ok.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: What's goin' on?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: Well, first of all, Paulo and I are not back together. It was just a stupid thing I did, and if I could go back in time and do it again, well, I wouldn't. Um, second of all, what?

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Ok. Well, before I say anything, I just need to know, is this one of those things where you break up with a guy, and then I tell you what I think, and then the next day you get back together with the guy, and I look like a complete idiot?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: No. No-no-no-no.

utterance.speaker: ROSS
utterance.content: Well, then, I think, I think the guy is scum. I hate him. I physically hate him. I always have. You are way too good to be with a guy like that. You deserve to be with someone who appreciates you, and who gets how funny and sweet and amazing, and adorable, and sexy you are, you know? Someone who wakes up every morning thinking "Oh my god, I'm with Rachel". You know, someone who makes you feel good, the way I am with Julie. Was there a second of all?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: No, I think that was the whole all.

utterance.speaker: JOEY
utterance.content: I swear to god, Dad. That's not how they measure pants.

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: I was thinking of doing it a little shorter, you know, like Andy McDowell's new haircut?

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: You wanna do it right now?

utterance.speaker: JULIE
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Ok, I just wanna be really sure this time. Andy McDowell's the girl from Four Weddings and a Funeral, right?

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: No. No no no no no. That's Rodney McDowell. Andy McDowell is the guy from Planet of the Apes.

utterance.speaker: PHOEBE
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Ok, thank you.

utterance.speaker: RACHEL
utterance.content: You're welcome.
